title: Kikanshita Yuusha no Gojitsudan - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beastkin   Beautiful Female Lead   Clubs   College/University   Cooking   Dense Protagonist   Dragons   First-time Interc**rse   Former Hero   Goddesses   Gods   Heroes   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Naive Protagonist   Organized Crime   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Returning from Another World   Royalty   Special Abilities   Summoned Hero   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Technological Gap   Terrorists   Unrequited Love   Wars   Werebeasts   World Travel   Younger Sisters
author: Tsukiyono Furudanuki   月夜乃 古狸
description: In a fraction of a second, an university student, Kashiwagi Yuuya was summoned to another world and came back. Time didn't pass in Japan, but Yuuya has completed the quest as a hero in another world and successfully returned. But to his surprise, he still retains his powers as a hero. Thus started the unordinary life of a hero in present day.>
